page.title: 15HEALTH SALTFORD WEST OF BATH
page.content: {Doctors }Saltford surgery, morning and evening, monday to friday. Two Keynsham surgeries also serve.Doctor will visit patient's home.night_time and other emergencies are radioed to duty doctor by keynsham area Radio Emergency Service.{District Nursing {Servive }The clinic is in Keynsham, 2\ miles away.Babies,mothers and elderly visited at home.Infant welfare clinic in Saltford Hall.Day care centre in Keynshsam for elderly.{Chiropody} Elderly attend Saltford Hall. Handicapped collected by ambulance. {Dentists}Two dentists practise in Saltford.School children examined in school.{Hospitals}Patients are sent to Bath or Bristol.Keynsham Hospitol for maternity and gereatrics.{Opticians} Keynsham School children examined at school and referred to clinic.
